name: 约书亚.尼米提.马纳特彭
name_full: 约书亚.尼米提.马纳特彭 Yoshi Nimit Manatpon
introduction: 约书亚.尼米提.马纳特彭，昵称“吉，是现已解散的泰国流行乐队金特(2008-2014)的泰国-法国歌手。他毕业于朱拉隆功大学，获得艺术传播学士学位。他曾在《嘻哈》(2011年)和《守护者的崛起》(2012年)中担任特技演员。Nimit Manatpon, nicknamed Yoshi, is a Thai-French singer member of the now defunct Thai pop band C-Quint (2008-2014). He graduated from Chulalongkorn University with Bachelor in Communication of Art Degree. He has taken part in stuntman jobs for 'Hop' (2011) and 'Rise of the Guardians' (2012).
name_more_cn: 约书亚.尼米提.马纳特彭
name_more_other: นิมิต มนัสพล
